sourcesContent:
// src/components/AddCard.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import './AddCard.css'; // Harici CSS dosyasını ekliyoruz const AddCard = () => { const [cardType, setCardType] = useState(''); const [creditCardData, setCreditCardData] = useState({ cardNumber: '', cardHolderName: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', bankName: '', creditLimit: '', availableBalance: '', minimumPayment: '', interestRate: '', billingDate: '', dueDate: '', installments: false, }); const [debitCardData, setDebitCardData] = useState({ cardNumber: '', cardHolderName: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', bankName: '', accountNumber: '', IBAN: '', balance: '', withdrawalLimit: '', isContactless: false, }); const handleCardTypeChange = (e) => { setCardType(e.target.value); }; const handleCreditCardChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setCreditCardData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value, })); }; const handleDebitCardChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setDebitCardData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value, })); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let payload = {}; if (cardType === 'Credit') { payload = { ...creditCardData, cardType: 2, // CardType.Credit }; } else if (cardType === 'Debit') { payload = { ...debitCardData, cardType: 1, // CardType.Bank }; } else { alert('Lütfen kart türünü seçin.'); return; } try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/cards', payload); console.log('Kart başarıyla eklendi:', response.data); alert('Kart başarıyla eklendi!'); // Formu sıfırlamak isterseniz: setCardType(''); setCreditCardData({ cardNumber: '', cardHolderName: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', bankName: '', creditLimit: '', availableBalance: '', minimumPayment: '', interestRate: '', billingDate: '', dueDate: '', installments: false, }); setDebitCardData({ cardNumber: '', cardHolderName: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', bankName: '', accountNumber: '', IBAN: '', balance: '', withdrawalLimit: '', isContactless: false, }); } catch (error) { console.error('Kart ekleme hatası:', error); alert('Kart eklerken bir hata oluştu.'); } }; return (

Kart Ekle

{cardType === 'Credit' && (

Kredi Kartı Bilgileri

)} {cardType === 'Debit' && (

Banka Kartı Bilgileri

)}
); }; export default AddCard;
